name: Climate Control
description:
Description

Everyone knows it.. finding the correct temperature in the office.

One wants it warm the other cold and the next one prefers fresh air.

But do people think about what they do to their environment and the global temperature?
Sadly not...

When employees leave their offices the radiators will heat throughout the night and in the morning when they come back they will open all windows because "It's too hot"...

Start thinking about your environment and disable all radiators, air conditioners and close all windows when you are heading home...


Instructions Goal

Try to maintain a comfortable temperature at work while minimizing the impact on the environment.

You will loose when the Global temperature reaches it's limit.

Movement

  Move with WASD
  To rotate press and hold the right mouse button down.
  Zoom with the mouse wheel.

Object Interaction

Press E or Space to interact with objects.

Interactable Objects Air conditioner

Cools the office while heating up the Environment.
When turned on the color changes from white to blue.

Radiator

Heats up the office.
When turned on the color changes from white to red.

Window

Evens out the temperature inside and oustside.
